page.title: 01Area as a whole
page.content: Hibaldstow is situated in the flood plain of the Vale of Ancholme 6km from the market town of Brigg and 12km from the industrial areas of Scunthorpe.The area is principally agricultural with large fields spreading across the Vale to the Lincolnshire Wolds.The village can be described as loosely nucleated. The original settlement has expanded recently along the main routeways.This is an ancient area mentioned in the original Domesday Book and contains within its parish the deserted village of Gainsthorpe.Hibaldstow provides employment but this is mostly to be found in the nearby towns of Brigg and Scunthorpe.
